pedigrees.line1: Quick Start. To search pedigrees quickly use the "QUICK PEDIGREE SEARCH" form that appears on the top right corner througout the website.
pedigrees.line2: Note: Titles are not part of the name, so if you want to find Garner's CH Chinaman ROM type "garner's chinaman". If you include the title inside the name you will not find it.
pedigrees.line3: To add new pedigrees just click on its icon above and follow instructions. Once you've entered some dogs, you can find them using the "QUICK PEDIGREE SEARCH" form. Then just open its pedigree and you will see a bunch of icons that will allow you to edit the different parts of the pedigree. Click on those icons and follow instructions.
pedigrees.line4: If you have questions go to the Forums and post on the Support Area.
pedigrees.emptyMessage: No pedigree was found matching the search criteria. It is recommended to check the entered information or try with different terms.

yourPedigrees.title: YOUR PEDIGREES
yourPedigrees.emptyMessage: You have not yet registered any pedigree
yourPedigrees.emptyMessage2: No pedigree has been created yet. To start, click on the New Pedigree button
yourPedigrees.selectMessage: Select a pedigree to view more details

uploadDeleteImg.text: To upload a picture just click the browse button and select the picture you want to upload. Once you see the location of the picture appear on the upload picture field click the upload button.
uploadDeleteImg.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the current photo?

changeOwner.confirm: Are you sure you want to transfer ownership of this dog to {{newOwner}}?

publicLink.text1: To share this pedigree on the message board, copy the URL below and paste it into your post.
publicLink.text2: To add a link to this pedigree on your website, copy the HTML code and paste it into the webpage where you want the link to appear.

newPedigree.textStep1: For each pedigree in the database we know who its parents are by storing their identification numbers in their file. For this reason, the parents must first be entered in the database. If the parents are not in the database, you cannot know who their parents are and the dog will be shown as a dog with unknown parents. If you know that the parents are already in the database, either because you have entered them yourself or someone else has, use the search forms below to find and select the parents. Otherwise, just go to the next step without selecting any or click on "Mark as unknown".
newPedigree.note: Note: The search forms below are just like the "Search pedigree:" form above. So to find the sire of your dog, type in the "Search sire:" form just what you would type in the "Search pedigree" form above. The same applies for the dam.
newPedigree.textStep2: In this step you will enter the dog's information such as the registered name, breeder, owner, color, etc. You need to provide a registered name at the very least. Since we are not a registry it does not have to be an officially registered name with the adba or ukc or any other registry. If you can provide a registered name, enter that one, otherwise enter the name as the dog is best known and use the coventional format like "Garrett's Jeep", "Carver's Stompanato", etc.
newPedigree.note2: Notes: Titles should be entered in their respective fields, not in the registered name field. Before name titles are CH, GR CH, etc. After name titles are ROM, POR, etc. If the dog is known by several names you can enter them all using AKA to separate the names. For example, "Chico's Joker AKA Pitstop's Joker" or "Crenshaw's Jeep AKA Garrett's Jeep".

changePermissions.textIsNotEditable: The pedigree {{name}} cannot be seen by other users. Izf you want to change it, activate the option at the bottom and click OK.
changePermissions.textIsEditable: The pedigree {{name}} can be seen by other users. If you want to change it, activate the option at the bottom and click OK.
changePermissions.label: Allow other users to edit this pedigree
changePermissions.confirm: Are you sure to allow other users to view this pedigree?
changePermissions.noConfirm: Are you sure you are sure to prevent other users from seeing this pedigree?

deletePedigree.text: If you want to delete the pedigree {{name}}, click the Delete Pedigree button and then click OK.
deletePedigree.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this pedigree?
